column1: Local Foods////I'm in Houston for the week for work and read all the reviews on this place and thought I'd give it a try. The ambiance is really inviting and not at all too pretentious for a local food place. Service was great
column2: and prices were fair for what you get and the food quality. If definitely recommend the crunchy chicken sandwich and the slaw. The kale salad was a little hard to eat in the cup it comes with. The only bad feedback I have is that the chicken was a bit on the dry side and could have used a touch more of the delicious sauce. The pretzel bun is incredible
column3: not matter what sand which you get
